alert.note: Alert for Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 28 at 1:32PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Tehama and south central Shasta Counties through 215 PM PST... At 131 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dairyville, or 10 miles north of Red Bluff, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dairyville, Paynes Creek, Manton and Cottonwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley
